name: Milk9 Creative Studio Branding
tagline: Especialista em naming e logo design
description: I am creative director and partner of MilkBrands logo creation. We have been operating for 19 years advertising and brand design. We become experts and reference in the realization of embryonic projects (starting from scratch). Today, 70% of our contracts are based on early stage projects. We specialize in creating names, logos and launch campaigns. We developed the entire launch strategy, from the venture / product name to launch campaign design.
